name: ShareRadio
0:
”Alexa, play share radio”
”Alexa, ask share radio what is playing”
”Alexa, ask share radio who's on air now”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: share radio
des:
Share Radio provides speech programmes at 9am and 2pm each day, news on the hour and lots of instrumental folk music: great background listening for work or reading when you need your concentration elsewhere. Visit our website shareradio.co.uk, or search our podcast library under ‘Hrkn’ on Spotify, Amazon, Apple or Stitcher, for recent episodes. Sign in at shareradio.co.uk for our weekly newsletter, or to listen via the website.

Share Radio started broadcasting from Westminster, London in November 2014. It not only ‘shares ideas about money’ but also has always had a broad remit covering politics and economics, philosophy and entertainment, and other quality speech. Presenters include Simon Rose, Adam Cox and Georgie Frost, and we include programmes from Motley Fool Money and This Is Money.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
